column4: I extracted a virus from virtual box running windows. Im running Ubuntu 9.10 and i want to know if its possible to open a .exe file to view whats inside.
you said look inside how do you mean how it works?
then a hex editor is what you need but you need knowledge of assembley language
google serves me well and what i cant find or learn, someone from the channel might now. I will find what i need to know.
i have read a bit though about programming
well thats what i mean, windows uses c++ do they not, specially for exes
yeah but you cant reverse it to the language you have to reverse it to machine code
no harm in trying it might be over your head but you get familar with it so if you want to learn its not totally foreign
either way its not going to infect your linux box unless its a root kit which is unlikely
I tried. Itried gedit and geany
cant. says  could not open the file, select a charater coding from the menu and try again
windows has its uses cant beat it for gaming
i do agree with the gaming.
the language dont make much difference when reversing its all hex
